      • holdsReadLock

        boolean holdsReadLock()
        Returns:
        true if this thread is inside read action.
        See Also:
        Application.runReadAction(Runnable)

      • isWriteActionInProgress

        boolean isWriteActionInProgress()
        Returns:
        true if the EDT is performing write action right now.
        See Also:
        Application.runWriteAction(Runnable)

      • isWriteActionPending

        boolean isWriteActionPending()
        Returns:
        true if the EDT started to acquire write action but has not acquired it yet.
        See Also:
        Application.runWriteAction(Runnable)

default void doNotSave()

      • runProcessWithProgressSynchronouslyInReadAction

        boolean runProcessWithProgressSynchronouslyInReadAction(Project project,
                                                        java.lang.String progressTitle,
                                                        boolean canBeCanceled,
                                                        java.lang.String cancelText,
                                                        javax.swing.JComponent parentComponent,
                                                        java.lang.Runnable process)
        Executes process in a separate thread in the application thread pool (see Application.executeOnPooledThread(Runnable)). The process is run inside read action (see Application.runReadAction(Runnable)) If run from EDT, it is guaranteed that no other read or write action is run before the process start running. If the process is running for too long, a progress window shown with progressTitle and a button with cancelText.
        Returns:
        true if process run successfully and was not canceled.

      • exit

        default void exit(int flags)

      • exit

        default void exit()
        Description copied from interface: Application
        Exits the application, showing the exit confirmation prompt if it is enabled.
        Specified by:
        exit in interface Application

      • exit

        default void exit(boolean force,
                  boolean exitConfirmed)
        Parameters:
        force - if true, no additional confirmations will be shown. The application is guaranteed to exit
        exitConfirmed - if true, suppresses any shutdown confirmation. However, if there are any background processes or tasks running, a corresponding confirmation will be shown with the possibility to cancel the operation

      • restart

        void restart(boolean exitConfirmed)
        Parameters:
        exitConfirmed - if true, suppresses any shutdown confirmation. However, if there are any background processes or tasks running, a corresponding confirmation will be shown with the possibility to cancel the operation

      • restart

        default void restart()
        Description copied from interface: Application
        Exits and restarts IDE. If the current platform is not restart capable, only exits.
        Specified by:
        restart in interface Application

      • restart

        void restart(boolean exitConfirmed,
             boolean elevate)
        Restarts the IDE with optional process elevation (on Windows).
        Parameters:
        exitConfirmed - if true, the IDE does not ask for exit confirmation.
        elevate - if true and the IDE is running on Windows, the IDE is restarted in elevated mode (with admin privileges)

      • tryRunReadAction

        boolean tryRunReadAction(java.lang.Runnable action)
        Tries to acquire the read lock and run the action
        Returns:
        true if action was run while holding the lock, false if was unable to get the lock and action was not run
